entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json: custom "Ignore" conditions on properties #102945
  • [Mono] Add support for UnsafeAccessor mismatched generic constraint checking #102942
    Future
  • [.NET 8] Some Symbol Entries in perf-%pid.map Are Truncated #102938
  • [iOS/HybridGlobalization] RegionInfo instantiated by two-letter code is missing information #102937
  • `JsonObject` should support property order manipulation #102932
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity out of proc monitoring can't access Activity Events or Links #102924
    Future
  • Source generator tests failing with AV in Roslyn #102919
  • ISet in .NET 8 not populating from configuration as expected in .NET 6 #102926
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: DateOnly support for Calendar #102910
    Future
  • Implement IAlternateEqualityComparer<ReadOnlySpan<char>, string> on EqualityComparer<string>.Default #102906
    9.0.0

Closed

  • MeterListener continues to receive measurements after Dispose #102465
    Future
  • System.IO.Packaging.Open throws FileFormatException saying File contains corrupted data when the size of the package is more than 4GB and targeting .NET Framework #94899
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource: Out of proc monitoring can't influence IsEnabled #102935
    Future
  • CodeGen difference when manually extracting element to a local #102518
    9.0.0
  • JIT generates better code when expression is stored in variable #102273
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Constant is not propagated through a struct #87072
    9.0.0
  • BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd Timed Out #97735
    Future
  • SPMI Replay failing sporadically #102773
  • [System.Text.Json] Expose additional metadata in contract APIs. #102078
    9.0.0
  • Expose ElementType and KeyType on JsonTypeInfo metadata. #77306
    9.0.0
  • Build is broken for main due to conflicting PRs #102930
  • UnsafeAccessor throws MissingFieldException on enum fields #102792
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.4.24253.11] IPInterfaceProperties.GatewayAddresses. FirstOrDefault() returns Null #101710
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support parsing server-sent events (SSE) #98105
    9.0.0
  • Valgrind on Alpine Linux: Mismatched free() / delete / delete [] #70636
    9.0.0
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization correct HashCode ranges of skipped unicodes #101912
    9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Perf runs are broken #93880
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] ` Wasm.Browser.Config.Sample`, `Wasm.Browser.Config.Sample` fail #91676
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Optimize reading from Quic stream #58445
    Future
  • JIT Optimization (Stack Usage?) #13814
    Future
  • Fix incorrect `GTF_IND_NONFAULTING` setting that leads to an incorrect execution. #13762
    Future
  • Unsafe cast confuses JIT Inline Optimizer #47082
    Future
  • vs2022 17.5.0 preview2.0 failed to load the old project #79984

PullRequests

Created

  • Migrating EsrpCodeSigning Task From Version 4 to Version 5 #102948
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete VectorT size constants from minipal/cpufeatures #102946
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Baseline failing pri-1 JIT tests #102944
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview5] [wasm] Stop setting problematic runtime feature switches #102943
    Servicing-consider, area-Workloads
  • [test] Update the reason why Verify_Generic_ConstraintEnforcement is not running on Mono #102939
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [vm] fix confusing use of m_pCanonMT (NFC) #102936
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Stop setting problematic runtime feature switches #102934
    needs-area-label
  • Fix bug in referencing nested type in IL #102933
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix alloc-dealloc mismatch #102929
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Android and Linux-Bionic images #102928
    os-android, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Move targets of hot jumps to create fallthrough post-RPO layout #102927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add dotnet-diag to area-diagnostics-coreclr #102925
    area-Meta
  • refactor: rename COMPlus classes to make a clear distinction with COM interop #102922
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 4 #102921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add gcinfodumper implementation. #102920
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Optimize HttpUtility.JavaScriptStringEncode by using SearchValues #102917
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Baseline failing pri-1 interop tests #102916
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Experiment - Remove space restriction from XarchIntrinsicConstants #102913
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce allocation in HttpUtility.UrlPathEncode. #102909
    community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • ILCompiler.pkgproj: remove 'runtime.json' when DotNetBuildSourceOnly. #102908
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement IAlternateEqualityComparer support for Dictionary, HashSet, ConcurrentDictionary #102907
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Adding Activity.AddException #102905
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Tweak the fuzzing readme #102947
    needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • MeterListener.Dispose always disables measurements #102661
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #102053
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • JIT: Consume FMA intrinsic operands in right order #102914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Propagate `LCL_ADDR` nodes during local morph #102808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove reserved registers from parameter homing temp reg candidates #102168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable binder tracing test under jitstress #102842
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Update docs.microsoft.com usages to learn.microsoft.com #102881
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update DIA to 17.10.0-beta1.24272.1 #102640
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.31
  • [release/8.0] Update DIA to 17.10.0-beta1.24272.1 #102641
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.7
  • Baseline failing loader tests #102918
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add saturating decrement/increment by element count #102315
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Expose additional metadata on the STJ contract model. #102902
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Avoid a few allocations in JsonContent #102859
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Update new ActivatorCache usage to the new API model. #102931
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • Fix `UnsafeAccessor`s with enum fields #102853
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • fix NetworkInterface properties on Windows #102900
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Added SVE LoadVector*NonFaultingZeroExtendTo* APIs #102860
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add System.Net.ServerSentEvents #102238
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • `Activator.CreateInstance` supports ByRefLike types #102636
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Restrict the maximum length of BigInteger #102874
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update UnwindRegistersRestore.S #102901
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix computing new EH ranges in SubstitutedILProvider #102870
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement LoadVector*NonFaultingSignExtendTo* APIs #102903
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` correct `HashCode` ranges of skipped unicodes #102912
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr

Updated

  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Allow shuffle and other hwintrinsic that require a constant to stay intrinsic if the operand becomes constant later #102827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify utf8.c #102424
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make `MemoryMarshal.CreateSpan` an intrinsic on mono and use `MemoryMarshal.CreateSpan` instead of `Span` pointer constructor in Number.NumberBuffer.cs #102866
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2464547 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Activate some H/3 tests, consistent ConfigureAwait, RemoteExecutor.DisposeAsync #102699
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • [Release/8.0-staging] Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102530
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Propagate profile flags to loop preheaders in `Compiler::optCloneLoops` #102897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge #92901 #102862
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: GetActiveElementCount #102813
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Update prerequisites to add azure.identity #102274
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Optimize HttpUtility.UrlEncodeToBytes for (string, Encoding) overload. #102805
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove debug symbols from non-symbols ilc package #102803
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use `where T : allows ref struct` in runtime #102795
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Add fast path for linq count with predicate #102884
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #102565
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Fix Infinite loop on OdbcDataReader.internalGetString with UTF-8 text #102885
    area-System.Data.Odbc, community-contribution
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove noisy test #102610
    area-System.Net
  • forbid http request with invalid version #102423
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Remove runtimeconfig.template.json from templates and provide it by default #102818
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Align LA64 targetpacks with RV64 #102628
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [9.0-preview.4] Failed tests not reported to the console in CI #41299
  • Failed to create a 6.0 project with error "error NU1102: Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref with version (= 6.0.32)" After installing the June service .net 8.0 sdk #41297

Closed

  • MSBuild 17.9.4 no longer reports code style errors in build #39142
  • Add `dotnet nuget push --skip-duplicates` synonym for `--skip-duplicate` #41289
  • Add `dotnet nuget push --dry-run` #41284
  • [Pipelines] Failed to Sync VMR Due to R2R Patch #41285
  • Should netstandard2.0 library publish trim packages? #1855
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Removes problematic system.text.json switches #41322
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41320
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add implementation of Aspire service #41319
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • remove installer from version file #41316
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Import StaticWebAssets SDK only for browser-wasm #41306
    Area-WasmSdk
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Use a more reasonable timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #41294
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Increment branding to allow for razor hotfix #41287
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make SDK produced template nupkgs lowercase #41242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delete src/SourceBuild/patches/fsharp/0001-fix-fsharp-r2r-rid.patch #41298
    Area-VMR

Updated

  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2464403 #41254
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use version comparison function #41102
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41278
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086

  • [Proposal]: Params Collections #7700

PullRequests

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add documentation for TypeDefinitionDocument custom debug information #73816
  • Internal compiler crash when compiler diagnostic CS0103 is expected #73813
  • Accessibility issue in document outline window. #73810
    17.11 P3
  • Custom modifiers are not copied in array type collection expression lowering #73804
  • VS 17.10.0 preview 4 shows warnings where no Error is. #73802
  • Version 17.10.0 Preview 5.0 - Error list not showing all warnings #73801
  • Error list goes crazy while doing a refactoring #73800
  • Method defining line move when adding code before method declaration #73799
    Backlog
  • Methods with Optional String Parameters Won't Collapse #73798
  • Adding/Removing space when toggling line comments #73796
  • Filesystem pollution in `/tmp/` #73795

Closed

  • IDE0130 is not reported correctly in 8.0.2xx #73261
  • C# Syntax highlighting of type references is broken #73803
  • IDE0100 (Remove unnecessary equality operator) catches `x == false` as redundant #73787
  • SourceGenerators: MSBuild property (and metadata?) values are (potentially) truncated before being passed to Generator #72592
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Razor to 9.0.0-preview.24281.3 #73817
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Optimize helper we use to determine the relevant node of a particular kind the user is on. #73812
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to workspace service to ensure the analyzer loader uses streams on linux #73809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Global options #73808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #73794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge partial properties feature to main #73815
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cancel classification work for the portions of the view outside of hte viewport. #73811
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change branch mapping #73807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Prepare partial properties feature for merge #73773
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Simplify fix-all code #73805
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Copy the ITelemetryReporter to a local before using #73790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Always use DiagnosticHelper.Create for diagnostics with options #73339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add more boolean simplification cases #73806
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Address a few locations also need to care about partial properties #73792
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove poison attributes #73751
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Perform nav bar computation in two passes #73786
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix exponential blowup parsing pathological files #73788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce Linq usage in SymbolDisplayVisitor.CreateAliasMap #73793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Rename SG run mode from Balanced to Manual #73784
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Generate ISymbol implementations at runtime to avoid type load errors #73675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Perf] Slow E2E tests due to unrecycled chrome instances #56004
  • Un-serious Bug?? #56003
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #56002
  • Perf regression: fortunes #56001
  • Perf improvement: json #56000
  • Validation Model not compiling #55999
  • Blazor: Error on adding new scoped CSS since last update #55998
  • Better UX - show "loading" (anything) while app is starting up the .NET WebAssembly runtime (for AutoRender, prerender false) #55997
  • The � symbol "replacement character issue" #55994
  • Blazor hybrid with WPF, memory leak. #55993
  • ArgumentException while OutputCache is cached #55988
  • Blazor InputDate does not work properly #55987
  • Allow BL0005 warning suppression #55986
  • Lazy Loading separate Razor Class Library project in Blazor Web App #55985
  • Recursive symlink created while following Components build script #55983

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55377
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #55991
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, plaintext #55992
  • HealthCheckMiddleware unexpected behavior, still running through the other middlewares in the chain #55972
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55977
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #55907
  • [9.0-preview.4] Remove x-aspnetcore-id from OpenAPI responses #55832
    9.0-preview5
  • NET 8 minimal API: Error in AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 8.0.0 #52388

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9b4993c` to `a7f443b` #55995
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixes #55987 , input date does not work properly on interactive serve… #55990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add hidden input for easier binding in static edit forms #55989
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Fix urls in ProjectTemplates/README #55984
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Update https://docs.microsoft.com to https://learn.microsoft.com #55970
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6
  • Pass through CancellationToken #55941
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview6
  • Update WithOpenApi docs and scrub description IDs #55924
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Update Templates.Mvc.Tests Helix Timeout #55981
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview6
  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • Update AuthenticationSchemeProvider.cs public constructor summary punctuation #55919
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Background set to Transparent doesn't have the same behavior as BackgroundColor = Transparent #22769
  • The Comma Seperator is disabled on the Samsung Numeric keyboard. #22761
  • FontImageSource renders slow on Android in ImageButton and Image #22757
    9.0-preview5
  • TabbedPage in FlyoutPage in navigationPage on android with android:TabbedPage.ToolbarPlacement="Bottom" does not fit all screen #22755
  • iOS App crashes when populating CollectionView #22754
  • (iOS) - Memory Leak in CollectionView with GroupItemTemplate on iOS in MAUI #22752
  • Using radiobuttons in a group, pressing one button works fine, but pressing the seconf button does not reset the first hence "blocks" the radio buttons all together. #22750
    .NET 8 SR6
  • No service for type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Hosting.EffectsFactory' has been registered #22748
    .NET 8 SR7

Closed

  • ListView duplicate first item #22742
  • Multi-Window in Windows with all options #6210
    Backlog
  • Give developers more (full) control over control colors #7542
    Backlog
  • [Android] ContentViewHandler is incompatible #7884
    Backlog
  • Need Material Design implemented as part of Visual quite like Xamarin.Forms #9689
    Backlog
  • If the user hasn't specified a VSM then look at ways to only apply color changes to the "normal" state of a control #8819
    Under Consideration
  • MAUI needs a good (selfhosted) serverless partner. #11435
    Backlog
  • Build MAUI library targeting .NET6 should have a Platforms folder #10689
    Under Consideration
  • XmlReader performance #10103
  • Removing a background on iOS does not remove the background #12117
    Backlog
  • Reinstate xml-docs build artifact for easier API docs publication #22736
  • iOS Binding Library Errors: Undefined symbols for Architecture arm64 (also x86_64) #22770
  • Error when running the project as windows machine #22498
  • Taskbar badge notifications for Windows apps #13994
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Precompiled queries: only process queries for the specific context type #33866
  • Nullability issues with `unhex()` #33864
  • .Net MAUI App sql Connection for edmx #33863
  • Updating JSON column when query tracking is disabled fails #33862
  • Custom Sql exceptions for constraint violations, configured through Fluent Api #33861
  • Inconsistent behaviors when loading related entities explicitly with Query and Include #33859

Closed

  • Implement null semantics for comparison operators #31020
    9.0.0
  • Exception when `SELECT`ing `(x ? A : default(int?) >= B)` #33752
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update Cosmos testing actions #33865
  • Improve error message #33851
  • Fix comparison of nullable values #33757

Updated

  • Add precompiled query generation to the dbcontext optimize command #33747
  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715
  • Skip sync tests in Cosmos #33756
